frontmatter.title: Loading
frontmatter.description: Loading spinners are used when retrieving data or performing slow computations, and help to notify users that loading is underway.

internal.content:
---
title: Loading
description:
  Loading spinners are used when retrieving data or performing slow
  computations, and help to notify users that loading is underway.
tabs: ['Usage', 'Style', 'Code', 'Accessibility']
---

<PageDescription>

Preview the loading component with the React live demo. For detailed code usage
documentation, see the Storybooks for each framework below.

</PageDescription>
